personalInfo.clubAffl: The Fox Club Course (Palm City, Florida)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditionally Exempt: 38th qualifier from Qualifying Tournament, Money List 61-100
tourBios.carHigh:
2012: Posted his first top-10 finish of the campaign when he was T5 at the Miccosukee Championship. Had shared the 36-hole lead with Steve LeBrun after rounds of 65-70, but followed with rounds of 72-73 to slide down the leaderboard on the weekend... Wound up missing the cut at the Cox Classic but matched the biggest positive turnaround in tournament history when he rebounded to shoot an 8-under 63 after opening with a 77. Despite the discrepancy in his scores, he hit seven of 14 fairways in both rounds. 

2011: Was T30 at the Utah Championship for his first made cut in a Web.com Tour event.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Recorded five college wins at Illinois...Big-Ten Conference All-Academic team three years...Twice named to the Big-Ten Conference first team...Honorable mention All-American at Illinois.
tourBios.personal: Instructors include Mike Adams and John DeForest...Favorite course he played is Bethpage State Park's Black Course...Enjoys watching the Dallas Cowboys...Favorite cities to visit are New York and Las Vegas...Twitter account is @cdefo...Was a college teammate of current Web.com Tour player Luke Guthrie and occasional Web.com Tour player Scott Langley.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T5th in 2012 at the Miccosukee Championship.
